name: CMGMT_EPISODE_TYPES
description: This table contains a list of Coordinated Care Management episode case types. Case types refer to case management programs.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CMGMT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the category ID for the types on the Coordinated Care Management episode.
